description:
<p>An exciting opportunity has arisen to join ELFT's team of highly specialist patient safety incident reviewers to undertake serious incident investigations on a bank position basis. We are looking for a highly motivated candidates with extensive experience in root cause analysis methodology, clear understanding of human factors in health care and investigating patient safety incidents in an NHS setting.</p>
<p><br />In return you will be rewarded not only with a competitive salary, you will have the opportunity to positively influence the care and services delivered across the Trust's service provision and improve patient's and carers experience.</p>
